name: AsianFanfics - Light Blue Theme
description:
A custom theme for asianfanfics. Created by Deirdre. For questions and inquiries please go here. (Vote or subscribe!) How to Install:
  • Install Stylish
  • Change your theme to the default Blue Theme
  • Install the theme
